channel.title: Scores on Ocean Health Index
channel.description: Recent content in Scores on Ocean Health Index

item.title: Data Download
item.description: 10 YEARS OF SCORES! The OHI 2021 global assessment calculates 10 years of ocean condition, from 2012 to 2021, for 220 coastal countries and territories! Download Scores Global and country Index scores are provided as well as goal scores and score components (see score metadata). See Methodology tab for an overview of OHI score calculations. PREPARATION MATERIALS In addition to providing scores, we make all code available online on GitHub.
